Smart Power Strip: A smart power strip is a power strip with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, allowing users to control and monitor their devices remotely through an app. The power strip can be used to turn on and off devices, adjust volume, and even schedule on and off times. It can also detect when devices are not in use and automatically turn them off to save energy.

Power Strip with Built-in USB Charging Ports: This power strip includes multiple USB charging ports, allowing users to charge their devices simultaneously. It also includes a built-in surge protector to protect devices from power surges and spikes. The power strip can be used to charge multiple devices at once, making it a convenient and space-saving option for home or office use.

Portable Power Strip with Solar Panel: This power strip is designed to be portable and can be powered by a built-in solar panel, making it ideal for outdoor use. It can be used to charge devices while camping, at the beach, or during a power outage. The power strip includes multiple USB charging ports and a built-in surge protector to protect devices from power surges and spikes.

Power Strip with Built-in Cooling Fan: This power strip includes a built-in cooling fan that helps to keep devices cool while they are charging. It can be especially useful during hot summer months or in spaces with poor air circulation. The power strip can be used to charge multiple devices at once, making it a convenient and space-saving option for home or office use.

Power Strip with Built-in Power Monitoring System: This power strip includes a built-in power monitoring system that allows users to track their energy usage in real-time. It can be used to monitor energy usage for individual devices or for the entire home. The power strip can also be used to set energy-saving goals and receive alerts when energy usage exceeds those goals. This can help users to save money on their energy bills and reduce their carbon footprint.
